DOC.brief_summary: The object study determine variable associate therapy-success cognitive behavioral self help intervention insomnia . In study participant receive online self-help CBT manual consist information ( psycho-education ) sleep cognitive-behavioural exercise . Adult person insomnia invite via popular scientific website fill online questionnaire . Participants measure 4 , 16 , 40 week intervention questionnaire .
